preview_articles.title: BlueCodeAgent: A blue teaming agent enabled by automated red teaming for CodeGen AI
preview_articles.summary: BlueCodeAgent is an end-to-end blue-teaming framework built to boost code security using automated red-teaming processes, data, and safety rules to guide LLMs’ defensive decisions. Dynamic testing reduces false positives in vulnerability detection.

To scale RL, the foremost prerequisite is maintaining stable and robust training dynamics.
